handlePlatformEvent(bytes32,string).notice: Handle an incoming platform event and return the corresponding action.

mapNavigation(bytes32,string).notice: Map a navigation transition to a platform-specific navigation action.

mapZone(bytes32,string).notice: Map a layout zone role to platform-specific configuration.

register(bytes32,string,string).notice: Register a platform adapter with its platform type and configuration.
